articles.description: Seth Greenberg explains why Loyola-Chicago could potentially win a first-round matchup after earning their first NCAA tournament appearance in 33 years.
articles.headline: Greenberg eyeing Loyola-Chicago for possible upset

images.caption: Seth Greenberg explains why Loyola-Chicago could potentially win a first-round matchup after earning their first NCAA tournament appearance in 33 years.
images.name: Greenberg eyeing Loyola-Chicago for possible upset

articles.description: The final regular-season look at Power Rankings looks nothing like the first one, that's for sure. We look back and some hits and misses -- yeah, don't remind us about Arizona State being No. 1 -- and peek toward the madness ahead.
articles.headline: Final regular-season college hoops Power Rankings: What we got right and wrong

articles.description: This is the list you don't want to be on. Kansas is on it. So is Kentucky. Who isn't? Well, eight men's basketball teams avoided having their name called.
articles.headline: The 343 teams that will not win the national championship

articles.description: What are NBA executives saying about this draft class? Here are six players on the move in our latest rankings of the top 100 prospects.
articles.headline: NBA draft stock watch: Biggest risers, new No. 1 in top 100

images.caption: Deandre Ayton just posted two of his best games of the season.
images.name: Deandre Ayton [608x342]

images.caption: Cincinnati's Jacob Evans steals from Austin Reaves, takes it up the court and hits a bank shot in the lane while drawing a foul.
images.name: Evans goes coast-to-coast for bucket

articles.description: Joe Rosga banked in an off-balance 3-pointer with 3.2 seconds left in regulation and Denver held off Oral Roberts for a 90-88 victory on Sunday night in the second double-overtime game in Summit League Tournament history.
articles.headline: Denver wins in Summit League tourney's 2nd two-overtime game

videos.description: Esa Ahmad picks Dylan Osetkowski's pocket and converts a transition layup for West Virginia.
videos.headline: Press Virginia forces early turnover for quick points

videos.description: Jericho Sims drives to the basket and throws down a thunderous two-handed slam for the Longhorns.
videos.headline: Sims rises for emphatic slam

videos.description: James Banks III hauls in the offensive rebound and coverts a second-chance bucket in the first half.
videos.headline: Banks converts second-chance putback

videos.description: West Virginia's Sagaba Konate gets the ball in the post and spins by his defender to convert a tough one-handed shot.
videos.headline: Konate spins by defender to convert post bucket

videos.description: Dylan Osetkowski launches a full-court pass to Jericho Sims in transition for a two-handed slam.
videos.headline: Osetkowski connects with Sims on full-court pass

videos.description: Matt Coleman drives down the lane and converts a tough floater early in the second half.
videos.headline: Coleman sinks acrobatic floater

videos.description: Kerwin Roach II drives down the baseline and converts a nifty reverse layup for the Longhorns.
videos.headline: Roach nails sweet reverse lay-in

videos.description: Kerwin Roach II lofts a pass up to Jericho Sims at the rim for a two-handed slam.
videos.headline: Roach feeds Sims for alley-oop slam

videos.description: Jevon Carter takes it to the paint and converts a reverse lay-in to even the game up at 72.
videos.headline: Carter converts tough layup to tie game

videos.description: Kerwin Roach II drops a pass off to Jericho Sims for an emphatic two-handed slam for the Longhorns.
videos.headline: Sims puts Konate on poster with monster dunk

videos.description: Kerwin Roach II tries putting Sagaba Konate on a poster with a thunderous one-handed dunk, but Konate rises up to deny the attempt in overtime.
videos.headline: Konate denies Roach's dunk attempt
